span.p: The Lincolnview High School Science Club competed in the Science Olympiad regional contest at Bowling Green State University on February 29th.
LHS earned top-ten finishes in five events. Those in the top six were awarded medals for their efforts!

ul.li: Peter McMaster & Charlie Sherer placed 2nd in Detector Building
Cole Gorman & Charlie Sherer placed 5th in Wright Stuff
Katrina Behrens placed 8th in Gravity Vehicle
Lillian Ogden & Behrens placed 9th in Geologic Mapping

span.p: An extra special congratulations to Peter McMaster & Charlie Sherer for their second place finish in Detector Building. That is the highest place that a Lincolnview team has ever achieved at the regional level!

Governor Mike DeWine has recently ordered all K-12 schools in Ohio to be closed for at least three weeks (or an “extended spring break”) to help slow down the spread of Coronavirus (COVID-19). As a result of this executive order, the Lincolnview Local Schools will be closed beginning Tuesday, March 17, 2020 through at least Friday, April 3, 2020.

p.br:
Lincolnview, rooted in community, is the premier educational destination
for the success of ALL learners.

Cultivating an innovative learning environment – igniting students’ minds
and preparing them to excel academically, socially and morally to impact the world.
